data.content:
Zilean (Winterblessed Zilean)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: December 10, 2015

Winterblessed Zilean is a skin that brings a touch of frost and holiday cheer to the time-wielding champion, Zilean. Released on December 10, 2015, this skin offers a unique and festive look for Zilean, perfect for the winter season.

The Winterblessed Zilean skin transforms the Chronokeeper into a jolly old man, dressed in a warm winter outfit. Zilean dons a long, flowing white robe with fur trimmings, reminiscent of a traditional Santa Claus costume. His hat is replaced with a cozy winter cap, complete with a fluffy white pom-pom. The skin also features snowflake patterns on Zilean's robe and staff, adding to the wintery theme.

One of the standout features of the Winterblessed Zilean skin is the visual effects. Zilean's abilities are given a frosty makeover, with icy particles and snowflakes accompanying his time-manipulating spells. The Chronoshift ability, which revives allies, is particularly impressive, as it now encases the target in a shimmering ice crystal before bringing them back to life.

Furthermore, Winterblessed Zilean also has unique recall animation. When Zilean recalls, he sits on a magical floating sled, gliding through the air as he returns to base. It's a delightful touch that adds to the overall charm of the skin.

Now, let's delve into the story of Zilean and his place in the League of Legends universe. Zilean, known as the Chronokeeper, is a powerful mage who has mastered the manipulation of time. He hails from the ancient city of Urtistan, which was destroyed in a catastrophic event. Zilean was the only survivor, but he was not left unscathed. The flow of time became erratic for him, causing him to experience moments out of order.

Despite his temporal affliction, Zilean dedicated himself to understanding the nature of time and its manipulation. He became a guardian of time, using his abilities to prevent disasters and alter the course of events. Zilean's ultimate ability, Chronoshift, allows him to reverse time for a short period, effectively bringing an ally back to life.

In the game, Zilean is primarily played as a support or mid-lane mage. His ability to manipulate time makes him a valuable asset to any team. He can speed up allies, slow down enemies, and even rewind time to undo mistakes. Zilean's ultimate ability, Chronoshift, can turn the tide of a team fight by reviving a fallen ally, giving them a second chance to fight.

However, Zilean does have his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and positioning to be effective, making him a challenging champion to master.

If you want to explore more about Zilean and his various appearances in the game, you can find detailed information and videos on this page. From classic Zilean to the festive Winterblessed Zilean, each skin offers a unique visual experience while retaining the core essence of the Chronokeeper.

So, whether you're looking to spread holiday cheer on the Rift or simply appreciate the mastery of time manipulation, Winterblessed Zilean is a skin that brings a touch of winter magic to League of Legends.

Zilean (Old Saint Zilean)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: December 15, 2010

Old Saint Zilean, a festive skin for the time-warping mage Zilean, brings the holiday spirit to the Fields of Justice. With his jolly appearance and gift-giving theme, this skin is a perfect choice for spreading cheer during the winter season. Let's delve into the story behind Old Saint Zilean and explore all the delightful details of this costume.

Old Saint Zilean is dressed in a traditional Santa Claus outfit, complete with a red and white fur-trimmed coat, matching hat, and black boots. He carries a large sack filled with presents on his back, ready to deliver joy to all. The skin also features unique visual effects, such as snowflakes trailing behind Zilean as he moves and a festive recall animation where he disappears into a chimney.

As we know, Zilean is a time mage who has mastered the art of manipulating time itself. He hails from the ancient city of Urtistan, where he dedicated his life to unraveling the mysteries of time magic. However, his obsession with time led him to become detached from the world, and he found solace in the company of clocks and gears.

Despite his reclusive nature, Zilean's powers caught the attention of the League of Legends, an organization that brings together champions from various realms to compete in battles. Recognizing his potential, the League invited Zilean to join their ranks, where he could use his time-altering abilities to influence the outcome of matches.

In the game, Zilean is primarily played as a support or mid-lane mage. His unique ability,
allows him to manipulate time to either speed up an ally or slow down an enemy. This skill, combined with his ultimate ability,

which can revive a fallen ally, makes Zilean a valuable asset to any team.

However, Zilean also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and positioning to be effective, making him a challenging champion to master.

Now, let's take a moment to appreciate the various appearances of Zilean in the League of Legends universe. From his classic skin, which showcases his scholarly appearance, to the futuristic
skin, there are plenty of options to suit every player's taste. Whether you prefer the whimsical charm of
or the mysterious allure of

each skin offers a unique visual experience.

Overall, Zilean is a fascinating champion with a rich backstory and versatile gameplay. His time-manipulating abilities make him a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield, while his unique appearance and skins add a touch of personality to his character. If you're interested in learning more about Zilean and his various skins, be sure to explore the videos and information available on this page.

Zilean (Time Machine Zilean)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2010

Time Machine Zilean is a skin for the time-warping champion Zilean in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin takes Zilean's time manipulation abilities to a whole new level, giving him a futuristic and mechanical appearance that perfectly complements his time-traveling theme.

With Time Machine Zilean, players can experience the thrill of controlling time itself as they navigate the battlefield. This skin features a complete visual overhaul for Zilean, transforming him into a steampunk-inspired time traveler. His traditional robes are replaced with a sleek, metallic suit adorned with gears and cogs, giving him a more mechanical and futuristic look. His staff is also upgraded, now resembling a high-tech device with glowing energy pulsating through it.

One of the standout features of Time Machine Zilean is the attention to detail in his animations. As he moves around the map, gears and cogs spin and rotate, emphasizing his mechanical nature. When casting his abilities, Zilean's time manipulation powers are visually enhanced, with futuristic effects and particles that add an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience.

Furthermore, Time Machine Zilean also brings new voice lines and sound effects to the game. Zilean's voice is modified to sound more robotic and mechanical, further emphasizing his transformation into a time-traveling machine. These audio enhancements add an extra layer of immersion and make playing Zilean with this skin a truly unique experience.

Now, let's delve into the story of Zilean and how he fits into the world of League of Legends. Zilean, the Chronokeeper, is a powerful mage who has mastered the art of manipulating time. He hails from the city of Icathia, a once-great civilization that was destroyed by the Void. Zilean, however, managed to escape the destruction by using his time-altering abilities.

As a champion in League of Legends, Zilean's strengths lie in his ability to control time and manipulate the battlefield. His primary role is that of a support mage, providing utility and crowd control for his team. Zilean's most iconic ability is his ultimate,

which allows him to revive a fallen ally, turning the tide of team fights and saving his teammates from certain death.

However, Zilean also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and positioning to be effective, making him a challenging champion to master.

In the lore of League of Legends, Zilean's past is intertwined with the concept of time itself. He is a guardian of time, tasked with preventing temporal disruptions and maintaining the balance of the universe. Zilean's time-traveling abilities allow him to witness events before they happen and manipulate the flow of time to his advantage.

Within the game, Zilean's place is primarily in the support role, where he excels at protecting and enabling his teammates. His ability to speed up allies with
and slow down enemies with
makes him a valuable asset in team fights and skirmishes. Additionally, his ultimate ability,

can turn the tide of battles by reviving fallen allies and giving them a second chance to fight.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Zilean, including the Time Machine Zilean skin. Whether you're a fan of Zilean or simply interested in exploring the different skins available for this champion, this page is your go-to resource for all things Zilean.

Zilean (Groovy Zilean)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 1, 2010

League of Legends is known for its diverse range of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that stands out is

a vibrant and psychedelic costume for the time-warping mage, Zilean. Released on April 1, 2010, this skin brings a groovy and retro vibe to the champion, transforming him into a colorful and eccentric character.

The Groovy Zilean skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a mid-tier skin in terms of cost. However, the visual and thematic changes it brings to Zilean's appearance make it a popular choice among players who want to add a touch of nostalgia and fun to their gameplay.

Details of the Costume

Groovy Zilean takes inspiration from the psychedelic era of the 1960s and 1970s, with vibrant colors, swirling patterns, and a distinct hippie aesthetic. Zilean himself is adorned in a tie-dye robe, complete with bell-bottom pants and platform shoes. His long white beard is now accompanied by a colorful headband, and he carries a staff with a peace sign on top.

The skin also introduces unique visual effects and animations. Zilean's abilities now leave behind a trail of colorful particles, and his ultimate ability, Chronoshift, envelops the target in a psychedelic aura when activated. The recall animation showcases Zilean dancing and grooving to the beat of the music, adding an extra touch of whimsy to the skin.

Overall, Groovy Zilean is a visually striking skin that captures the essence of the groovy era, making it a delightful addition to any Zilean player's collection.

The Story of Zilean

Zilean, the Chronokeeper, is a time-manipulating mage who hails from the city of Icathia. Once a respected sage, Zilean's life took a dramatic turn when he discovered an ancient artifact known as the Time Rune. The power of the Time Rune granted Zilean the ability to control time itself, but it came at a great cost. The flow of time became distorted around him, aging him rapidly and trapping him in a perpetual loop of existence.

Now, Zilean wanders the world, seeking to undo the mistakes of his past and prevent catastrophic events from occurring. He has become a guardian of time, using his powers to manipulate the temporal fabric and alter the course of history. Zilean's ultimate ability, Chronoshift, allows him to reverse time and bring allies back from the brink of death, ensuring that their fate is rewritten.

In the world of League of Legends, Zilean is primarily played as a support mage. His ability to manipulate time makes him a valuable asset to any team, as he can speed up allies, slow down enemies, and even rewind time to undo mistakes. Zilean's time bombs are a signature ability, allowing him to place explosive devices on enemies that detonate after a short delay, dealing significant damage.

However, Zilean does have his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and positioning to be effective, making him a challenging champion to master.

Despite his weaknesses, Zilean has found his place in the game as a strategic and supportive champion. His ability to control time and turn the tide of battles has made him a favorite pick among players who enjoy playing a supportive role while still having a significant impact on the game.

Explore Zilean's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Zilean and his various appearances in League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on this page. From his classic appearance to the groovy and psychedelic Groovy Zilean skin, there is a wide range of options to choose from to suit your style and preferences.

Whether you prefer the timeless wisdom of the Chronokeeper or the colorful and eccentric vibes of Groovy Zilean, Zilean offers a unique and enjoyable gameplay experience. So, embrace the power of time and join Zilean on his quest to rewrite history!

Zilean: The Chronokeeper

Release Date: April 18, 2009

Within the vast and diverse world of League of Legends, there are champions that stand out for their unique abilities and captivating stories. One such champion is Zilean, the Chronokeeper. With his mastery over time and his enigmatic background, Zilean brings a fascinating dynamic to the game. In this article, we will delve into the depths of Zilean's story, explore his strengths and weaknesses, and understand his significance within the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Zilean

Zilean's tale begins in the ancient city of Urtistan, a place renowned for its mastery of time magic. Born with an innate connection to the temporal realm, Zilean quickly became a prodigy in the art of chronomancy. However, his thirst for knowledge led him to experiment with forbidden techniques, resulting in a catastrophic accident that left him forever bound to the flow of time.

Trapped in a perpetual loop, Zilean experiences every moment simultaneously, forever aware of the past, present, and future. This eternal existence has granted him unparalleled wisdom and insight, but it has also burdened him with the weight of countless lifetimes. Determined to make amends for his past mistakes, Zilean now dedicates himself to protecting the fabric of time and guiding others towards their destinies.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Zilean's unique abilities make him a formidable force on the battlefield. As the Chronokeeper, he possesses the power to manipulate time, granting him unparalleled control over the flow of combat. His primary strength lies in his ability to manipulate the speed of allies and enemies alike, allowing him to dictate the pace of engagements and turn the tide of battles.

One of Zilean's most iconic abilities is his Time Bomb. With a flick of his wrist, Zilean can attach a bomb to an enemy, which detonates after a short delay, dealing significant damage. This ability not only inflicts direct damage but also creates a sense of urgency and chaos among enemies, forcing them to reposition and disrupt their plans.

Furthermore, Zilean's ultimate ability, Chronoshift, grants him the power to reverse time and revive a fallen ally. This ability can turn the tide of team fights, providing a second chance for a crucial member of the team. The ability to cheat death is a potent tool in Zilean's arsenal, making him an invaluable asset in high-stakes battles.

However, Zilean's power over time comes with its own limitations. His abilities are heavily reliant on precise timing and positioning. Misjudging the detonation of a Time Bomb or mistiming the use of Chronoshift can leave Zilean and his allies vulnerable to counterattacks. Additionally, Zilean's lack of mobility and limited crowd control abilities make him susceptible to aggressive assassins and champions who can quickly close the gap.

Zilean's Place in the Game

Zilean's unique skill set and captivating lore have made him a beloved champion within the League of Legends community. His ability to manipulate time adds an exciting and strategic element to the game, allowing players to outmaneuver their opponents and turn the tide of battles. Zilean's supportive nature also makes him an excellent choice for players who enjoy aiding their teammates and providing utility to the team.

Within the game, Zilean often finds himself in the mid lane or supporting his allies in the bottom lane. His ability to harass opponents with Time Bombs and control the pace of engagements makes him a formidable mid-lane mage. In the support role, Zilean's ability to speed up allies and revive fallen teammates can turn the tide of bot lane skirmishes and provide crucial utility in team fights.

Furthermore, Zilean's unique playstyle and strategic depth make him a favorite among experienced players. Mastering the art of timing and positioning is essential to fully utilize Zilean's abilities, making him a rewarding champion for those who enjoy a challenge.

On our website, you can find a comprehensive collection of information and videos showcasing all of Zilean's skins. From the whimsical Time Machine Zilean to the futuristic Blood Moon Zilean, each skin offers a unique visual experience that further enhances the character's lore and appeal.

In conclusion, Zilean, the Chronokeeper, brings a captivating narrative and a unique playstyle to the world of League of Legends. With his mastery over time and his ability to manipulate the flow of combat, Zilean offers players a strategic and rewarding experience. Whether you seek to control the battlefield or support your allies, Zilean's time-bending abilities make him a force to be reckoned with.

Zilean (Shurima Desert Zilean)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: August 27, 2015

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and appearances. One such champion is Zilean, the Chronokeeper, who has recently received a new skin called

. This article will delve into the story behind this skin and explore all the intricate details of its design.

Shurima Desert Zilean is a skin that transports Zilean, the time-wielding mage, to the arid and unforgiving deserts of Shurima. This skin is part of the Shurima-themed skin line, which includes other champions like Azir, Nasus, and Renekton. With this skin, Zilean undergoes a complete visual transformation, donning desert-inspired attire and adopting a new color scheme.

The costume features Zilean wearing a long, flowing robe adorned with intricate patterns and symbols reminiscent of the ancient Shuriman civilization. The robe is predominantly sandy brown in color, reflecting the harsh desert environment. Zilean's head is covered with a hood, shielding him from the scorching sun, and his face is partially obscured by a scarf, adding an air of mystery to his appearance.

One of the most striking aspects of the Shurima Desert Zilean skin is the addition of sand-themed particles and effects. Zilean's abilities now leave behind a trail of swirling sand, emphasizing his connection to the desert. The sand particles add a visually pleasing element to his time-manipulating spells, making them feel more immersive and thematic.

Furthermore, the skin incorporates unique animations and sound effects. Zilean's recall animation shows him sitting cross-legged on the ground, surrounded by a swirling sandstorm, as he meditates and manipulates time. The sound effects accompanying his abilities have been modified to match the desert theme, with sand-like noises and subtle wind sounds enhancing the overall experience.

Now that we have explored the details of the Shurima Desert Zilean skin, let's take a moment to delve into the story of Zilean himself. Zilean is a powerful mage who hails from the city of Urtistan, which was once a thriving center of knowledge and magic in the Shuriman empire. However, disaster struck when Xerath, an ambitious mage seeking ultimate power, unleashed a cataclysmic event known as the Rune Wars.

During the Rune Wars, Zilean was caught in a magical explosion that tore through Urtistan. The explosion imbued him with the power to control time, but it also trapped him in a perpetual state of aging. Zilean became unstuck from the flow of time, forever bound to relive the same moments over and over again.

Despite his tragic fate, Zilean embraced his newfound abilities and dedicated himself to preserving the flow of time and preventing catastrophic events. He became the Chronokeeper, using his powers to manipulate time and guide others towards a better future. Zilean's role in the League of Legends is that of a support mage, utilizing his time-based abilities to aid his allies and hinder his enemies.

In terms of gameplay, Zilean possesses a unique set of strengths and weaknesses. His ability to manipulate time allows him to speed up allies or slow down enemies, providing valuable utility in team fights. Zilean's ultimate ability,

can revive a fallen ally, turning the tide of battle in their favor.

However, Zilean's reliance on his abilities makes him vulnerable when his mana pool runs low. Additionally, his lack of mobility and squishy nature can make him an easy target for assassins and burst damage champions. Zilean requires careful positioning and timing to maximize his impact in fights.

In conclusion, the Shurima Desert Zilean skin offers players a visually stunning and thematic alternative to Zilean's default appearance. With its desert-inspired design, sand particles, and unique animations, this skin truly captures the essence of the Shuriman desert. Whether you're a fan of Zilean or simply appreciate well-crafted skins, Shurima Desert Zilean is a worthy addition to any collection.

For more information about Zilean and to see all of his appearances in action, be sure to visit our page dedicated to this timeless champion.

Zilean (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Zilean, the Chronokeeper, is a unique and enigmatic champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his ability to manipulate time, Zilean has become a formidable force on the battlefield. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Zilean's default costume and explore all the intricate details of his appearance.

The Story Behind Zilean's Default Costume

Zilean's default costume is the original outfit that players encounter when they first select him as their champion. It perfectly captures the essence of his character and showcases his mastery over time. The costume features a long, flowing robe adorned with intricate patterns and symbols, symbolizing the ancient knowledge and wisdom that Zilean possesses. The colors of the robe are predominantly blue and gold, representing the celestial nature of time itself.

Zilean's head is covered by a hood, concealing his face and adding an air of mystery to his appearance. The hood is adorned with a golden trim and a large, ornate clockwork design, signifying Zilean's connection to the gears of time. His eyes, glowing with an otherworldly blue hue, peer out from beneath the hood, hinting at the immense power he wields.

The most striking feature of Zilean's default costume is the massive clockwork backpack he carries. This intricate device is filled with gears, cogs, and hourglasses, all meticulously crafted to represent the intricate workings of time. The backpack emits a soft, pulsating glow, indicating the constant flow of temporal energy that Zilean harnesses.

Overall, Zilean's default costume is a testament to his role as the guardian of time. It exudes an aura of ancient wisdom and power, captivating players and immersing them in the fantastical world of League of Legends.

The Story of Zilean

Zilean, once a humble sage, became entwined with the flow of time after discovering an ancient artifact known as the Time Rune. This encounter granted him the ability to manipulate time itself, turning him into the Chronokeeper. With his newfound powers, Zilean dedicated himself to preserving the delicate balance of time and preventing catastrophic events from altering the course of history.

In the game, Zilean's abilities revolve around his mastery of time manipulation. He can rewind time, granting himself or his allies a second chance in battle. Additionally, Zilean can slow down or speed up the flow of time, affecting the movement speed of both his allies and enemies. His ultimate ability,

allows him to revive a fallen ally, turning the tides of battle in their favor.

Zilean's strengths lie in his ability to control the battlefield and dictate the pace of engagements. His time-manipulating abilities make him a valuable asset in team fights, as he can provide crucial utility and support to his allies. However, Zilean's reliance on his abilities leaves him vulnerable when they are on cooldown, making him susceptible to aggressive opponents who can exploit his temporary weakness.

Throughout his journey, Zilean has encountered numerous challenges and faced formidable foes. He has crossed paths with champions like Ekko, who also possesses time-manipulating abilities, and has even clashed with powerful entities such as the Voidborn. Despite these trials, Zilean remains steadfast in his mission to safeguard the flow of time and protect the world from temporal disruptions.

Zilean's Place in the Game

Zilean is primarily played as a support champion in League of Legends. His ability to manipulate time and provide utility to his team makes him a valuable asset in the bot lane. Zilean's time-warping abilities can turn the tide of team fights, allowing his allies to engage or disengage with precision timing. Additionally, his ultimate ability can single-handedly save a teammate from certain death, making him a crucial pick in competitive play.

In addition to his support role, Zilean can also be played in the mid lane as a mage. His ability to poke and harass opponents with time bombs, while simultaneously providing utility to his team, makes him a versatile pick in certain team compositions. However, Zilean's lack of mobility and reliance on his abilities for damage output can make him susceptible to assassins and burst damage champions.

Zilean's unique playstyle and time-manipulating abilities make him a favorite among players who enjoy strategic gameplay and providing support to their team. His presence on the battlefield can turn the tide of battles and secure victory for his allies.

Explore Zilean's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Zilean's various appearances and skins, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated page. Discover the different costumes and visual updates that Zilean has received throughout his journey in League of Legends. Immerse yourself in the world of time manipulation and experience the thrill of playing as the Chronokeeper.

Zilean (Blood Moon Zilean)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: February 10, 2016

Blood Moon Zilean is a captivating skin that brings a dark and mysterious twist to the timeless champion, Zilean. Released on February 10, 2016, this skin is part of the Blood Moon skin line, which features champions in a demonic and supernatural theme. With its unique design and intricate details, Blood Moon Zilean is a must-have for any Zilean enthusiast or collector of rare skins.

The Blood Moon Zilean skin transforms the Chronokeeper into a fearsome and otherworldly figure. Zilean's traditional robes are replaced with a crimson and black ensemble, adorned with intricate patterns and symbols. His once gentle and wise appearance is now shrouded in darkness, reflecting the sinister nature of the Blood Moon. The skin also features new spell effects, animations, and sound effects, further enhancing the immersive experience of playing as Blood Moon Zilean.

The Blood Moon Zilean skin is a testament to the attention to detail and creativity of the League of Legends design team. From the flowing robes to the haunting mask, every aspect of the skin has been meticulously crafted to create a visually stunning and thematically consistent experience. Whether you're using Zilean's abilities to manipulate time or simply enjoying his unique playstyle, Blood Moon Zilean adds an extra layer of excitement and immersion to your gameplay.

Zilean: The Chronokeeper

Zilean, also known as the Chronokeeper, is a powerful mage who has mastered the manipulation of time. With his ability to control the flow of seconds, Zilean is a formidable force on the battlefield. He can speed up his allies, slow down his enemies, and even reverse time to undo mistakes. Zilean's unique playstyle revolves around his ability to manipulate time, making him a versatile and strategic champion.

In the lore of League of Legends, Zilean was once a respected sage who dedicated his life to the pursuit of knowledge. However, a tragic accident left him trapped in a timeless void, where he became unstuck from the flow of time. As a result, Zilean gained the ability to control time itself. With his newfound powers, Zilean became the guardian of time, using his abilities to protect the fabric of reality from those who would seek to disrupt it.

In the game, Zilean's strengths lie in his ability to control the pace of the game and provide utility to his team. His Time Warp ability allows him to speed up allies or slow down enemies, giving him excellent crowd control capabilities. Zilean's ultimate ability, Chronoshift, can revive a fallen ally, turning the tide of team fights and providing a crucial advantage. However, Zilean's reliance on his abilities and lack of direct damage can make him vulnerable in certain situations.

Zilean's unique playstyle and lore make him a beloved champion among League of Legends players. His ability to manipulate time adds a strategic element to the game, requiring players to think ahead and make calculated decisions. Whether you're a fan of his lore, his gameplay, or simply his unique appearance, Zilean is a champion that stands out in the League of Legends universe.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Zilean, including the Blood Moon Zilean skin. Explore the different skins and discover the rich lore behind this timeless champion. Whether you're a seasoned Zilean player or just curious about his story, this page is your gateway to the world of Zilean in League of Legends.

Zilean (Sugar Rush Zilean)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 20, 2018

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. One such champion is Zilean, the Chronokeeper, who has recently received a delightful new skin called

. This whimsical skin transforms Zilean into a sugary sweet confection, adding a touch of sweetness to his time-bending abilities.

Sugar Rush Zilean is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. Released on November 20, 2018, this skin has quickly become a favorite among players who enjoy a more lighthearted and playful aesthetic.

The Story of Sugar Rush Zilean

In the world of League of Legends, Sugar Rush Zilean is a member of the Sugar Rush skin line, which features champions transformed into candy-themed versions of themselves. Zilean, known for his mastery over time, has been enchanted by the sweet magic of the Sugar Rush universe, turning him into a sugary treat.

In this skin, Zilean's appearance is completely transformed. He dons a vibrant, colorful outfit reminiscent of a candy store, with a top hat adorned with lollipops and a coat made of licorice. His staff is replaced with a giant candy cane, and his hourglass is now filled with colorful candies instead of sand. The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable, with every aspect of Zilean's design reflecting the sugary theme.

Not only does Sugar Rush Zilean bring a visually appealing transformation, but it also adds new animations and effects to his abilities. When casting his Q ability, Time Bomb, Zilean throws a giant candy instead of a time bomb, which explodes in a burst of colorful sugar. His W ability, Rewind, is accompanied by a shower of candy, adding a delightful touch to his time manipulation. The ultimate ability, Chronoshift, now envelops the target in a bubble of candy, further enhancing the whimsical nature of this skin.

Zilean's Story and Role in League of Legends

Zilean, the Chronokeeper, is a unique support mage in League of Legends. He is known for his ability to manipulate time, granting him unparalleled control over the battlefield. Zilean's kit revolves around his ability to speed up allies and slow down enemies, as well as his powerful ultimate ability, which can revive fallen teammates.

As a support champion, Zilean excels at protecting and enabling his allies. His Q ability, Time Bomb, allows him to place a bomb on an enemy champion, which detonates after a few seconds, dealing damage to the target and nearby enemies. This ability can be devastating when used in combination with Zilean's E ability, Time Warp, which can either speed up an ally or slow down an enemy, depending on the target. These abilities make Zilean a formidable force in team fights, as he can control the pace of the battle and dictate the movement of his allies and enemies.

Zilean's ultimate ability, Chronoshift, is what truly sets him apart from other champions. When activated, Chronoshift places a protective bubble on a target ally, preventing them from dying for a few seconds. If the target takes fatal damage during this time, they are instead revived with a portion of their health restored. This ability can turn the tide of a team fight, allowing Zilean to save his teammates from certain death and provide a second chance at victory.

While Zilean's strengths lie in his ability to control time and protect his allies, he does have some weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and positioning to be effective, making him a challenging champion to master.

In the lore of League of Legends, Zilean is a powerful mage who hails from the city of Icathia. He discovered the secrets of time magic and became obsessed with the concept of time manipulation. Zilean's experiments with time eventually led to his transformation into a being of pure energy, granting him immortality and the ability to control time itself.

Zilean's place in the game is primarily as a support champion, although he can also be played in the mid lane as a mage. His unique abilities and playstyle make him a valuable asset to any team, providing utility, crowd control, and the potential to turn the tide of a battle with his ultimate ability.

On the page dedicated to Sugar Rush Zilean, players can find more information about this delightful skin, including videos showcasing its animations and effects. Whether you're a fan of Zilean or simply enjoy the whimsical charm of the Sugar Rush skin line, Sugar Rush Zilean is a must-have addition to your collection.

So why not embrace the sweetness and add a touch of sugar to your League of Legends experience with Sugar Rush Zilean?
